p: Additionally, our extraction methods and results were supportive data for the Thai traditional preparation of drugs as the extraction by hexane is similar to preparation of the folk method called Hung-Nam-Mun (hot oil extract) [ 47]. These methods extensively use coconut oil for frying plant materials; however, a rancid odor because of coconut oil is apparent. Whereas maceration in hexane has no odor and a high extraction yield.
